forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
